pr_title: Fix assement due date display in Course Tab

timeline.message: add assessmentDueDate to convert date array method
fix date time pipe to recognize undefined values

timeline.author: filip-gregurevic

replies.bodyText:
Meaning the moment(null) evaluates to false anyways, right?
I agree on that! So in order to keep it consistent I should then change it for all three dates I guess.
replies.author: tessaRuckstuhl
